1.1.1.title: Non-text Content

wcagDefinition.title: Non-text Content
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Alt text presence and quality can be detected programmatically
wcagDefinition.manualNeeded: Quality assessment of alt text relevance

1.1.1.reasoning: Alt text presence and quality can be detected programmatically. Automated tools are available for detection. Manual testing needed for: Quality assessment of alt text relevance.
1.1.1.testingInstructions: Use automated tools to detect missing alt attributes

1.2.1.title: Audio-only and Video-only (Prerecorded)

wcagDefinition.title: Audio-only and Video-only (Prerecorded)
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Requires human assessment of media content and alternatives

1.2.1.reasoning: Requires human assessment of media content and alternatives. No automated tools currently configured. Manual testing needed for: Content analysis and alternative evaluation.
1.2.1.testingInstructions: Check that prerecorded audio-only content has text transcripts and video-only content has audio descriptions or text alternatives.

1.2.2.title: Captions (Prerecorded)

wcagDefinition.title: Captions (Prerecorded)
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Caption presence can be detected, quality requires human review

1.2.2.reasoning: Caption presence can be detected, quality requires human review. No automated tools currently configured. Manual testing needed for: Caption accuracy and synchronization assessment.
1.2.2.testingInstructions: Verify that all prerecorded videos with audio have accurate

1.3.1.title: Info and Relationships

wcagDefinition.title: Info and Relationships
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Semantic markup can be detected, relationships need verification

1.3.1.reasoning: Semantic markup can be detected, relationships need verification. Automated tools are available for detection. Manual testing needed for: Relationship accuracy and completeness.
1.3.1.testingInstructions: Test that semantic markup conveys meaning. Check headings

1.3.2.title: Meaningful Sequence

wcagDefinition.title: Meaningful Sequence
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Reading order can be determined programmatically

1.3.2.reasoning: Reading order can be determined programmatically. No automated tools currently configured. Manual testing needed for: Sequence meaningfulness verification.
1.3.2.testingInstructions: Verify that content order in DOM matches visual presentation and logical reading order.

1.3.3.title: Sensory Characteristics

wcagDefinition.title: Sensory Characteristics
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Requires human interpretation of instructions and references

1.3.3.reasoning: Requires human interpretation of instructions and references. No automated tools currently configured. Manual testing needed for: Instruction clarity and alternative cues.
1.3.3.testingInstructions: Check that instructions don't rely only on shape

1.4.1.title: Use of Color

wcagDefinition.title: Use of Color
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Color usage patterns can be detected, meaning requires review

1.4.1.reasoning: Color usage patterns can be detected, meaning requires review. No automated tools currently configured. Manual testing needed for: Alternative indicators for color-conveyed information.
1.4.1.testingInstructions: Verify that color is not the only way to convey information. Check links

1.4.10.title: Reflow

wcagDefinition.title: Reflow
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Responsive behavior can be tested across viewports
wcagDefinition.manualNeeded: Content loss and horizontal scrolling edge cases

1.4.10.reasoning: Responsive behavior can be tested across viewports. Automated tools are available for detection. Manual testing needed for: Content loss and horizontal scrolling edge cases.
1.4.10.testingInstructions: Test page at 320px width (horizontal reflow) and 256px height (vertical reflow) to ensure no two-dimensional scrolling is required.

1.4.11.title: Non-text Contrast

wcagDefinition.title: Non-text Contrast
wcagDefinition.reasoning: UI component contrast can be calculated

1.4.11.reasoning: UI component contrast can be calculated. No automated tools currently configured. Manual testing needed for: Component identification and context assessment.

1.4.12.title: Text Spacing

wcagDefinition.title: Text Spacing
wcagDefinition.reasoning: CSS override effects can be tested programmatically

1.4.12.reasoning: CSS override effects can be tested programmatically. Automated tools are available for detection. Manual testing needed for: Content overlap and readability verification.
1.4.12.testingInstructions: Inject CSS to increase line-height to 1.5x

1.4.13.title: Content on Hover or Focus

wcagDefinition.title: Content on Hover or Focus
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Hover/focus triggers can be detected, behavior needs verification

1.4.13.reasoning: Hover/focus triggers can be detected, behavior needs verification. Automated tools are available for detection. Manual testing needed for: Dismissibility, persistence, and hover behavior.
1.4.13.testingInstructions: AUTOMATED: Run scripts to detect hover/focus triggered content

1.4.3.title: Contrast (Minimum)

wcagDefinition.title: Contrast (Minimum)
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Contrast ratios can be calculated programmatically

1.4.3.reasoning: Contrast ratios can be calculated programmatically. Automated tools are available for detection. Manual testing needed for: Edge cases and complex backgrounds.

1.4.4.title: Resize Text

wcagDefinition.title: Resize Text
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Text scaling behavior can be tested programmatically

1.4.4.reasoning: Text scaling behavior can be tested programmatically. No automated tools currently configured. Manual testing needed for: Usability at different zoom levels.
1.4.4.testingInstructions: Test that text can be zoomed to 200% without horizontal scrolling or content loss.

2.1.1.title: Keyboard

wcagDefinition.title: Keyboard
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Basic keyboard navigation can be tested programmatically

2.1.1.reasoning: Basic keyboard navigation can be tested programmatically. Automated tools are available for detection. Manual testing needed for: Complex interactions and workflow completion.
2.1.1.testingInstructions: Navigate entire page using only keyboard. Verify all functionality is accessible and no keyboard traps exist.

2.1.2.title: No Keyboard Trap

wcagDefinition.title: No Keyboard Trap
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Focus traps can be detected through navigation testing

2.1.2.reasoning: Focus traps can be detected through navigation testing. Automated tools are available for detection. Manual testing needed for: Complex modal and widget behaviors.
2.1.2.testingInstructions: Test that keyboard focus can always move away from any component without getting stuck.

2.1.4.title: Character Key Shortcuts

wcagDefinition.title: Character Key Shortcuts
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Requires testing of actual key combinations and conflicts

2.1.4.reasoning: Requires testing of actual key combinations and conflicts. No automated tools currently configured. Manual testing needed for: Shortcut discovery and conflict assessment.
2.1.4.testingInstructions: Check that single character keyboard shortcuts can be disabled or modified.

2.4.1.title: Bypass Blocks

wcagDefinition.title: Bypass Blocks
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Skip links and landmarks can be detected

2.4.1.reasoning: Skip links and landmarks can be detected. Automated tools are available for detection. Manual testing needed for: Functionality and target verification.
2.4.1.testingInstructions: Test for skip links or other mechanisms to bypass repeated navigation and content blocks.

2.4.2.title: Page Titled

wcagDefinition.title: Page Titled
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Page title presence and structure can be verified

2.4.2.reasoning: Page title presence and structure can be verified. Automated tools are available for detection. Manual testing needed for: Title descriptiveness and accuracy.
2.4.2.testingInstructions: Verify that all pages have descriptive and unique titles.

2.4.3.title: Focus Order

wcagDefinition.title: Focus Order
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Tab order can be programmatically determined
wcagDefinition.manualNeeded: Logical order and visual flow verification

2.4.3.reasoning: Tab order can be programmatically determined. Automated tools are available for detection. Manual testing needed for: Logical order and visual flow verification.
2.4.3.testingInstructions: Test that tab order follows logical sequence and preserves meaning.

2.4.4.title: Link Purpose (In Context)

wcagDefinition.title: Link Purpose (In Context)
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Link text can be analyzed, context requires interpretation

2.4.4.reasoning: Link text can be analyzed, context requires interpretation. Automated tools are available for detection. Manual testing needed for: Purpose clarity and context sufficiency.
2.4.4.testingInstructions: Test that link purposes are clear from link text or surrounding context.

2.4.6.title: Headings and Labels

wcagDefinition.title: Headings and Labels
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Heading structure can be detected, descriptiveness needs review
wcagDefinition.manualNeeded: Heading and label clarity and descriptiveness

2.4.6.reasoning: Heading structure can be detected, descriptiveness needs review. No automated tools currently configured. Manual testing needed for: Heading and label clarity and descriptiveness.
2.4.6.testingInstructions: Test that headings and labels are descriptive and informative.

2.4.7.title: Focus Visible

wcagDefinition.title: Focus Visible
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Focus indicators can be detected and measured
wcagDefinition.manualNeeded: Visibility in various contexts and backgrounds

2.4.7.reasoning: Focus indicators can be detected and measured. Automated tools are available for detection. Manual testing needed for: Visibility in various contexts and backgrounds.
2.4.7.testingInstructions: Programmatically focus each interactive element and verify focus indicator has sufficient contrast and is visible.

3.1.1.title: Language of Page

wcagDefinition.title: Language of Page
wcagDefinition.reasoning: HTML lang attribute can be verified programmatically

3.1.1.reasoning: HTML lang attribute can be verified programmatically. Automated tools are available for detection. Manual testing needed for: Language accuracy verification.
3.1.1.testingInstructions: Test that pages have lang attribute declaring the primary language.

3.1.2.title: Language of Parts

wcagDefinition.title: Language of Parts
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Lang attributes can be detected, accuracy needs verification

3.1.2.reasoning: Lang attributes can be detected, accuracy needs verification. Automated tools are available for detection. Manual testing needed for: Language change identification and accuracy.
3.1.2.testingInstructions: Test that content in different languages is properly marked.

3.2.1.title: On Focus

wcagDefinition.title: On Focus
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Focus events and context changes can be monitored

3.2.1.reasoning: Focus events and context changes can be monitored. Automated tools are available for detection. Manual testing needed for: Unexpected changes and user experience.
3.2.1.testingInstructions: Test that focusing on elements doesn't cause unexpected context changes.

3.2.2.title: On Input

wcagDefinition.title: On Input
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Input events and changes can be monitored

3.2.2.reasoning: Input events and changes can be monitored. Automated tools are available for detection. Manual testing needed for: Unexpected changes and user experience.
3.2.2.testingInstructions: Test that changing form controls doesn't cause unexpected context changes.

3.3.1.title: Error Identification

wcagDefinition.title: Error Identification
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Error markup can be detected, identification needs review

3.3.1.reasoning: Error markup can be detected, identification needs review. Automated tools are available for detection. Manual testing needed for: Error clarity and identification completeness.
3.3.1.testingInstructions: Test that form validation errors are clearly identified and described.

3.3.2.title: Labels or Instructions

wcagDefinition.title: Labels or Instructions
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Labels can be detected, sufficiency needs assessment

3.3.2.reasoning: Labels can be detected, sufficiency needs assessment. Automated tools are available for detection. Manual testing needed for: Label clarity and instruction adequacy.
3.3.2.testingInstructions: Test that form fields have proper labels or instructions.

4.1.1.title: Parsing

wcagDefinition.title: Parsing
wcagDefinition.reasoning: HTML validation can be performed programmatically

4.1.1.reasoning: HTML validation can be performed programmatically. Automated tools are available for detection. Manual testing needed for: Impact assessment of parsing errors.
4.1.1.testingInstructions: Test that HTML markup is valid and properly structured.

4.1.2.title: Name

wcagDefinition.title: Name, Role, Value
wcagDefinition.reasoning: ARIA properties and roles can be verified
wcagDefinition.manualNeeded: Accuracy and completeness of accessible names

4.1.2.reasoning: ARIA properties and roles can be verified. Automated tools are available for detection. Manual testing needed for: Accuracy and completeness of accessible names.

4.1.3.title: Status Messages

wcagDefinition.title: Status Messages
wcagDefinition.reasoning: Live regions can be detected, messaging needs verification

4.1.3.reasoning: Live regions can be detected, messaging needs verification. Automated tools are available for detection. Manual testing needed for: Message appropriateness and timing.
4.1.3.testingInstructions: Test that status messages are announced to screen readers using ARIA live regions.

recommendations.title: Fix Test Method Inconsistencies
recommendations.action: Update database test_method values to match automated capabilities

recommendations.title: Add Automated Testing Capabilities
recommendations.description: 4 criteria could benefit from automated testing
recommendations.action: Implement automated test rules for these criteria

recommendations.title: Standardize Testing Templates
recommendations.description: Create standardized templates for consistent testing across projects
recommendations.action: Apply generated templates to seed data and testing procedures

automated.description: Automated testing template for WCAG criteria with high automation confidence
testing_procedure: Mark as pass/fail based on automated results
automated.sql_template:
-- AUTOMATED Testing Template
-- Generated: 2025-07-14T14:17:05.306Z

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'automated',
    testing_instructions = 'AUTOMATED: Use accessibility scanning tools to detect violations. Text scaling behavior can be tested programmatically'
WHERE criterion_number = '1.4.4';

manual.description: Manual testing template for WCAG criteria requiring human assessment
testing_procedure: Mark with confidence level and notes
manual.sql_template:
-- MANUAL Testing Template
-- Generated: 2025-07-14T14:17:05.306Z

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'manual',
    testing_instructions = 'MANUAL: Content analysis and alternative evaluation. Requires human assessment of media content and alternatives'
WHERE criterion_number = '1.2.1';

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'manual',
    testing_instructions = 'MANUAL: Caption accuracy and synchronization assessment. Caption presence can be detected, quality requires human review'
WHERE criterion_number = '1.2.2';

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'manual',
    testing_instructions = 'MANUAL: Sequence meaningfulness verification. Reading order can be determined programmatically'
WHERE criterion_number = '1.3.2';

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'manual',
    testing_instructions = 'MANUAL: Instruction clarity and alternative cues. Requires human interpretation of instructions and references'
WHERE criterion_number = '1.3.3';

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'manual',
    testing_instructions = 'MANUAL: Alternative indicators for color-conveyed information. Color usage patterns can be detected, meaning requires review'
WHERE criterion_number = '1.4.1';

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'manual',
    testing_instructions = 'MANUAL: Component identification and context assessment. UI component contrast can be calculated'
WHERE criterion_number = '1.4.11';

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'manual',
    testing_instructions = 'MANUAL: Shortcut discovery and conflict assessment. Requires testing of actual key combinations and conflicts'
WHERE criterion_number = '2.1.4';

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'manual',
    testing_instructions = 'MANUAL: Heading and label clarity and descriptiveness. Heading structure can be detected, descriptiveness needs review'
WHERE criterion_number = '2.4.6';

hybrid.description: Hybrid testing template combining automated detection with manual verification
testing_procedure: Assign manual verification for edge cases
hybrid.sql_template:
-- BOTH Testing Template
-- Generated: 2025-07-14T14:17:05.306Z

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'both',
    testing_instructions = 'HYBRID: Start with automated scanning for baseline detection. Manual verification required for Quality assessment of alt text relevance. Alt text presence and quality can be detected programmatically Tools available: axe-core, pa11y, lighthouse.'
WHERE criterion_number = '1.1.1';

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'both',
    testing_instructions = 'HYBRID: Start with automated scanning for baseline detection. Manual verification required for Relationship accuracy and completeness. Semantic markup can be detected, relationships need verification Tools available: axe-core, pa11y, lighthouse.'
WHERE criterion_number = '1.3.1';

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'both',
    testing_instructions = 'HYBRID: Start with automated scanning for baseline detection. Manual verification required for Content loss and horizontal scrolling edge cases. Responsive behavior can be tested across viewports Tools available: playwright.'
WHERE criterion_number = '1.4.10';

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'both',
    testing_instructions = 'HYBRID: Start with automated scanning for baseline detection. Manual verification required for Content overlap and readability verification. CSS override effects can be tested programmatically Tools available: playwright.'
WHERE criterion_number = '1.4.12';

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'both',
    testing_instructions = 'HYBRID: Start with automated scanning for baseline detection. Manual verification required for Dismissibility, persistence, and hover behavior. Hover/focus triggers can be detected, behavior needs verification Tools available: playwright.'
WHERE criterion_number = '1.4.13';

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'both',
    testing_instructions = 'HYBRID: Start with automated scanning for baseline detection. Manual verification required for Edge cases and complex backgrounds. Contrast ratios can be calculated programmatically Tools available: axe-core, pa11y, lighthouse.'
WHERE criterion_number = '1.4.3';

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'both',
    testing_instructions = 'HYBRID: Start with automated scanning for baseline detection. Manual verification required for Complex interactions and workflow completion. Basic keyboard navigation can be tested programmatically Tools available: axe-core, playwright.'
WHERE criterion_number = '2.1.1';

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'both',
    testing_instructions = 'HYBRID: Start with automated scanning for baseline detection. Manual verification required for Complex modal and widget behaviors. Focus traps can be detected through navigation testing Tools available: axe-core, playwright.'
WHERE criterion_number = '2.1.2';

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'both',
    testing_instructions = 'HYBRID: Start with automated scanning for baseline detection. Manual verification required for Functionality and target verification. Skip links and landmarks can be detected Tools available: axe-core, pa11y, lighthouse.'
WHERE criterion_number = '2.4.1';

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'both',
    testing_instructions = 'HYBRID: Start with automated scanning for baseline detection. Manual verification required for Title descriptiveness and accuracy. Page title presence and structure can be verified Tools available: axe-core, pa11y, lighthouse.'
WHERE criterion_number = '2.4.2';

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'both',
    testing_instructions = 'HYBRID: Start with automated scanning for baseline detection. Manual verification required for Logical order and visual flow verification. Tab order can be programmatically determined Tools available: axe-core, playwright.'
WHERE criterion_number = '2.4.3';

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'both',
    testing_instructions = 'HYBRID: Start with automated scanning for baseline detection. Manual verification required for Purpose clarity and context sufficiency. Link text can be analyzed, context requires interpretation Tools available: axe-core.'
WHERE criterion_number = '2.4.4';

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'both',
    testing_instructions = 'HYBRID: Start with automated scanning for baseline detection. Manual verification required for Visibility in various contexts and backgrounds. Focus indicators can be detected and measured Tools available: axe-core, playwright.'
WHERE criterion_number = '2.4.7';

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'both',
    testing_instructions = 'HYBRID: Start with automated scanning for baseline detection. Manual verification required for Language accuracy verification. HTML lang attribute can be verified programmatically Tools available: axe-core, pa11y, lighthouse.'
WHERE criterion_number = '3.1.1';

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'both',
    testing_instructions = 'HYBRID: Start with automated scanning for baseline detection. Manual verification required for Language change identification and accuracy. Lang attributes can be detected, accuracy needs verification Tools available: axe-core.'
WHERE criterion_number = '3.1.2';

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'both',
    testing_instructions = 'HYBRID: Start with automated scanning for baseline detection. Manual verification required for Unexpected changes and user experience. Focus events and context changes can be monitored Tools available: axe-core.'

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'both',
    testing_instructions = 'HYBRID: Start with automated scanning for baseline detection. Manual verification required for Unexpected changes and user experience. Input events and changes can be monitored Tools available: axe-core.'

UPDATE test_requirements SET 
    test_method = 'both',
    testing_instructions = 'HYBRID: Start with automated scanning for baseline detection. Manual verification required for Error clarity and identification completeness. Error markup can be detected, identification needs review Tools available: axe-core.'

UPDATE test_requirements SET
